node.display_long_description:
* Play 6 uniquely styled archery levels with leaderboards and endless increases in difficulty
* Rise to the occasion as enemies attack from all sides. Defeat simultaneous threats like an epic ninja.
* Get dropped into the action immediately with dead simple controls that you can learn instantly.
* Coordinated enemies give you endless challenges to solve.
* By design, there's no running away. There's no hiding. You must fight!

Experience blood pumping action in immersive and beautiful VR environments.  Enemy ninjas will utilize cooperative group attacks to swarm and surround you. You'll need to attack and block 360 degrees of action to survive.

18 Levels
4 Difficulty Modes
6 Ninja Weapons
* Swords
* Claws
* Staff
* Gauntlets
* Odachi & Wakizashi
* Naginata
4 Shadow Skill Abilities
* Bow & Arrow
* Shadow Step
* Energy Blast
* Chain Dart
Boss Battles
Daily Challenges
Unlockable Secret Modes

nodes.title: Ninja Legends Balance Update 2!
nodes.body_text:
We have heard your feedback about the balance of the game being too hard in the easiest difficulty.  This seems to be specifically focused around the Samurai characters.  So in this update we are doing a few things to make the Novice difficulty a bit easier.

Novice Changes:
Samurai and Boss health greatly reduced
Speed of all enemies reduced
Health of all enemies reduced
All projectiles can be blocked without slicing

Overall Changes:
Projectiles can now be dodged by moving after the projectile is thrown
Shortened tutorial

We'd also like to announce that Ninja Legends has launched on the SpringboardVR Platform and will be available in arcades soon!
If you are an arcade owner and would like to get Ninja Legends on the Quest, contact us and we can work it out.

We are also looking for playtesters on the archery update.  Message me directly if you are interested.  Our first testing build for that should be up this weekend.

node.reviewDescription:
You might pay $14.99 for a game that let's you unleash your inner Green Arrow or Hawkeye or Robin Hood.

Then another game for the same price and you get to be Deadpool and other sword wielders or your Benihana chef.

Fancy yourself more as Daredevil or Morgan Jones from Fear the Walling Dead using the long staff or Bo? You got that as well.

They don't even have a Wolverine game yet, but you can use claws just like him.

Not impressed yet? You can freeze time then teleport to your opponent, attack attack, like Nightcrawler and Sub-zero (okay he froze his opponents, but you kinda freeze them too).

Forgot the game's price but it is so worth it.

Almost forgot: The gauntlet! That's the literal Iron Fist, man. I hate using against the swordsmen but they get close enough, I  show them where Mike Tyson is!

website_page_meta.description: Now with 6 styles of archery! The most INTENSE combat experience on the Quest. Fight challenging enemies that attack from all sides while you slice your way through beautiful environments. Unlock amazing weapons and special ninjitsu abilities in your quest to retrieve the stolen Shadow Scrolls. Do you have what it takes to be a ninja legend?
website_page_meta.title: Ninja Legends · Oculus Quest
